name: Deep Space Rescue
description:
Have you played space arcade games till morning lights?

This new game has all you love about arcade games:
- play handmade unique levels made from asteroids
- collect crystals, ammo, shield-ups
- destroy monsters and asteroids
- destructable environment - smash, kill and destroy everything you want!

You play as as spaceship captain saving spaceship wreck survivors.
Strange monsters will make it not easy walk.
Start you adventure and discover space mistery right now!

As a captain lead your spaceship through a lot of sectors, avoiding asteroids, smashing monsters, collecting lifesaving capsules and crystals for upgrades

Now in game:
- lots of levels
- many monster types
- tons of collectable resources
- force fields and quests to disable them
- space adventure atmosphere with enigmatic storyline

Game is for ANDROID, offline (internet access is not needed) and free to play
